project.name: OIUE ODP service core
project.description: A bundle that oiue open data persistence core

properties.project.import: org.oiue.service.log;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.service.osgi;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.service.sql;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.table.structure;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.tools;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.tools.sql;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.tools.json;version="[1.0,2)", org.oiue.tools.string;version="[1.0,2)"
